ComicInfo.Summary:
RETURN TO SHATTERED GRID!
The UNLIMITED POWER era continues as the New Power Rangers - and Lord Drakkon - return to the new universe that Drakkon created in Shattered Grid.
But will Drakkon choose to save the New Power Rangers from the surprising threat waiting there for them... or will he betray them?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Matteo Scalera & Moreno DiNisio | 1 | B | Legacy Cover B | Daniele Di Nicuolo & Walter Baiamonte | 2 | C | Blank Sketch Cover C (Pink) | None | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Matteo Scalera & Moreno DiNisio | 4 | RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Daniele Di Nicuolo & Walter Baiamonte | 5 | RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Goni Montes | 6 | RI | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Goni Montes | Missing |
